casebody.data:
2001-3203 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Anthony J. HURST. No. 2001-KO-3203. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Hurst, Authony J.-Defendant; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. F, No. 411-194; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2000-KA-1899.

Denied.
